reviews.review: Uno de mis juegos favoritos. Aunque tiene desperfectos pero es un juego en potencia de ser muy buena
Das Game an sich macht sehr viel Spaß. Die Community ist toxisch.. Gecampe und getunnle ist mittlerweile zum Standard geworden..

Please Read FULL.  Note over 2500 hours
Started playing in the 4th anniversary of the game, thought it was the coolest thing ever, very fun in the beginning, game seemed stable and very fun, that is until you finally get a grip of the game and understand it and are able to play in the mid to high ranks, this is where the game crumbles. New players can have endless fun if you never care to learn the game, but the game instantly breaks beyond that point. There are patches, nerfs, buffs, "band-aids", to the game that barely hold it together. So many great mechanics in the game that would be fun to exercise, however most of the time you find yourself sitting there doing nothing whether you're killer or survivor. The game is unbalanced at its core leading players to play in a boring stand still way to be able to win. The hardcore community of this game is also very touchy when it comes to any negative feedback. It's like talking with a bunch of elementary school kids who have never said a bad word. This game has been progressively getting worse since I started playing, even the high ranks a year ago was much more fun than what it is today. This game is recommended only if you plan to be oblivious to the mechanics of the game, but you are a gamer of attention, skip this.
don't waste your money on this game go and play SCP containment breach instead or lego star wars the complete saga.
an amazing game i recomend it

忍耐が必要な、バグを楽しめる素質を問われるゲーム。

私はこのゲームが好きだ。だから、おすすめするが、それは一緒にやる友人がいるから楽しめている。

実際サバイバーを野良でやると、すぐに心折れて切断するやつや、無理に助けて自分がリタイアする羽目になるなど多く不快なことが起きる。

キラーでプレイすれば、相手はパーティーでこっちを煽り散らかしてくるク〇野郎が大量に発生している。

練習は非常に忍耐のいるものになるだろう。

しかし、それらを上回る非常に面白い回や、素晴らしいプレイヤーとのマッチもある。

そして、バグが起きたときにそれをゲームの変化として楽しめるかどうかも重要なポイントだ。
If you like to teabag killers at the Exit gate, 10/10. You like to play killer? play a different game!

One of the most fun games I have ever played, but its not without its problems. The devs have a hard time balancing aspects of the game and some killers and add ons have huge advantages compared to others. Due to it being asymmetrical the game will never be balanced, which is fine, but can be infuriating at times.
 In general, I would say that the game is normally survivor sided, but killers, no matter how low skill they are, can choose to camp, target, slug, or other abusive tactics that give that huge advantages. When killers do this they can "win" super easily, and it generally makes the game less fun for everyone.
The actual gameplay and wide variety of killers, maps, and perks allows you to play tons without ever getting repetitive, but to have fun you need to understand that some people aren't playing for fun and will actively ruin the game some matches just to secure a win.
Don't be that player, play for fun, even if it means you lose

Play As Survivor For Easy Mode 
 KIller For Nightmare Mode.

Do you have any form of masochist, sadist or troll tendencies? This game is for you! If you are a masochist play as survivor and enjoy getting chased, beat to the ground and getting a hook shoved through your shoulder numerous times repeatedly. If you are a sadist play as a killer, inflict pain on the survivors by actually being good at the game, camping the hooks or tunneling one player the entire game! Are you a troll? Oh the troll abilities you can run on either side of the fence. The .cough. fairly toxic .cough. community is perfect for you. I am a survivor main (mostly because I like to play with friends and to be frank am to blind to play killer well. Survivor just hides in grass and i'm like where'd they go?) and have returned to play this game numerous times and still enjoy playing it. They recently added boon totems which I think is a very interesting new game mechanic that I look forward to seeing what else they do with it. Always remember GLHF and GG.

This is probably one of the most frustrating and poorly balanced games I have ever played. I would strongly recommend you not play this. The devs make horrible decisions and decide to make nerfs based off of statistics that don't show the whole story. Recently, a killer had their best addon nerfed because too many people were using it. The reason why was actually because of how horrible it was to play that killer without the addon. They nerfed the addons of the least played killer in the game. A lot of killers were designed to counter "looping," which is essentially your only counterplay in the game. This leads to over half of the killers being very unappealing(to me at least). Almost every map has barely any redeeming qualities and about a quarter of them have caused me to go AFK instead of playing or close the game. The current meta is very stale and frustrating for both sides, and they don't seem intent on changing it up. There's a skill-based matchmaking system in place that has led to the game being increasingly more horrible over time(there's a series on youtube showing streamers having horrible experiences with it and wanting it to be removed, which the devs don't seem to want to.) There's little incentive nowadays to not play like a jerk. Even then, this game has one of the most toxic fanbases I've ever seen who will not hesitate to call anyone a jerk just for not giving them a free win. Overall, the game is a very strong 4-6/10

ガバマッチのクソゲー
一番下のランクにも関わらず赤帯とマッチして煽られて負けることを繰り返すクソゲーです。
公式でVCは禁止していても実際取り締まることは出来ないので当たり前のようにVCPTと当たり、赤帯などの上位者が始めたてキラーをフルボッコにして煽り倒して楽しんでいるのが現状です。
